Summary: found on video I was taking of pretty cloud. Unseen at time of video.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Salida
There were no other sightings in Salida on or around May 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI found three frames of this object in the last few seconds of a 30 second video I took of clouds. I did not see the object. I went into the video to extract images of the clouds and found a sphere moving up through the 3 frames. the first 2 were grey and the 3rd was white and very spherical looking. I am posting the original video and the 3 extracted frames. I can not tell how large or how close it is.
